titles: The medal of John Bayes a satyr against folly and knavery.
author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
notes: An answer by Thomas Shadwell to Dryden's The medal, which is an attack on Shaftesbury. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library and Duke University Library.
keywords: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, --  Earl of, 1621-1683.
